mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEM_HIST (MEMBER_NO, PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NM, INSTT_CODE, INSTT_NM, INPT_BGNDE, INPT_ENDDE, ROLE_CODE, CHRG_JOB, USE_LANG, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{project_no}, #{project_nm}, #{instt_code}, #{instt_nm}, #{inpt_bgnde}, #{inpt_endde}, #{role_code}, #{chrg_job}, #{use_lang} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), null, #{reg_id}, null, "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_MEM_HIST A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE MEM_HIST_NO = #{MEM_HIST_NO}
